abstract: An array of motion effect objects to apply as a group to the view.
overview:
## Discussion

The array contains one or more [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMotionEffect] objects. When the viewer offset changes, each object in the group is asked for its key paths and updated values. Those values are then applied simultaneously.

# motionEffects

**Instance Property**

An array of motion effect objects to apply as a group to the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var motionEffects: [UIMotionEffect]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The array contains one or more [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMotionEffect] objects. When the viewer offset changes, each object in the group is asked for its key paths and updated values. Those values are then applied simultaneously.
title: motionEffects
